qa_pair.question: Use the summarize_registry tool. How many columns are reported in the master clinical registry?
List the variables in the registry. How many unique variables are found when searching for a specific keyword known to exist in the registry metadata?
Check the integrity of the master registry using the appropriate tool. What is the status returned?
Generate a synthetic cohort of size 50. Does the tool report success and include 'COHORT GENERATED' in the output?
What is the resource URI used to access the master clinical registry content?
